title: Is it worth pursuing a graduate degree in veterinary medicine? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends what you mean by worth?  If you are looking at it from purely financial standpoint then human medicine is probably a better bet for a similar debt load and volume of schooling.  Veterinary medicine does have other benefits. I am not a vet, but the reason I have stayed in the profession is that on my worst day I can still walk into our lobby and meet a dog who is pleased to see me.  Veterinary medicine has pressures - mostly financial, however tends not to have the legal, regulatory, and insurance  issues of human medicine that some find so distasteful.  Mike
